text: The Volkswagen Sharan is a car produced by Volkswagen in two generations since 1995. The SEAT Alhambra and the Ford Galaxy are based on the same platform as the Sharan. == First generation (1995–2010) == === Engines === ==== Petrol ==== * 1.8 T 110 kW (150 hp) * 2.0 85 kW (115 hp) * 2.8 VR6 128 kW (174 hp) === Diesel === * 1.9 TDI 66 kW (90 hp), 81 kW (110 hp), 85 kW (115 hp), 96 kW (130 hp) and 110 kW (150 hp) * 2.0 TDI 103 kW (140 hp) == Second generation (2010–present) == === Engines === * 1.4 TSI 110 kW (150 hp) * 2.0 TDI 103 kW (140 hp) Sharan Category:1990s automobiles Category:2000s automobiles Category:2010s automobiles Category:2020s automobiles Category:Minivans
title: Volkswagen Sharan
